entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning early this evening then changing to rain this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
